tooltips.minQuantity: The rule will be applied only if the quantity of items being sold exceeds the specified value.
tooltips.currency: The amount will be converted to the specified currency before rounding. Also defines the currency of the surcharge.
tooltips.surcharge: An amount to add after percentage and rounding are applied. Use a negative number to subtract.
tooltips.roundingFactor: The amount will be round off to the multiple of the specified value.
tooltips.percentage: A percentage of the standard price to deduct or add.
